Cmd.CmdDesc: Starts the network. Should be run after setting the configuration parameters.
Sets the network parameters. This request can be used to change the default settings. It should be run before starting the Thread stack.

Parm.ParmDesc: The extended address is randomly generated or not.
If Rx is on while idle.

Cmd.CmdDesc: Add in White List Table. The White List will contain the neighbors that can be heard by the device.

Parm.ParmDesc: The neighbor Quality Link Indicator: Good Link: 20 - 255 Medium Link: 11 - 20 Bad Link: 3 - 10.

Cmd.CmdDesc: Sets a DHCP Server service for global addresses.

Parm.ParmDesc: The prefix to be advertised by the DHCP server.

Cmd.CmdDesc: Adds an external route. A network's External Route Set contains the available external routes off of the network, including both border routers and the prefixes for which they will route.

Parm.ParmDesc: The IP prefix of the border router.

Cmd.CmdDesc: A new version of network data, containing the services previously set, is propagated through the network.
The services previously set are registered to network's Leader.
Creates a new socket in the IP stack.
Closes a connection for a socket and clears any data that it uses.
Sets the local information for a socket.
Sends data using a connected socket(usually used for sockets over TCP).
Sends data using a connected socket(usually used for sockets over UDP).
Get data received on a connected socket(usually used for sockets over TCP)
Get data received on a connected socket(usually used for sockets over UDP)
Connect the socket to a remote socket(in case of UDP, just set the remote information).
Prepare a socket for accepting a connection.
Accept a connection from a client.
Set socket options
Get socket option
Bind an IP address to an interface.
Shows all the interfaces with their addresses.
Initiates a single ping request.
Send an IP packet over VTUN interface
Dtls Open
Dtls Close
Dtls Close Peer
Dtls Connect
Dtls Send

Confirmation of the socket receive request.
Confirmation of the socket connect request.
Confirmation of the socket listen request.
Confirmation of the socket accept request.
Confirmation of the socket set option request.
Get socket option.
Confirmation of the MAC parameters setting.

Cmd.CmdDesc: Confirmation of the bind to interface request.
